news.title: The case for more Fed rate cuts could rest on a 'systematic overcount' of jobs numbers
news.description: There are indications that policymakers will be more inclined to cut further if the labor market stays weak.

news.title: Dow jumps 600 points to record as Oracle sparks rush out of AI trade into broader market: Live updates
news.description: The S&P 500 fell as Oracle's results reignited fears about high-flying tech stocks.

news.title: Musk says SpaceX report of 2026 IPO is 'accurate'
news.description: Elon Musk ally Jared Isaacman looks set to be confirmed as the new NASA administrator after President Trump re-nominated him for the role.

news.title: Trump willing to seize more oil tankers off Venezuela coast, White House official says
news.description: The Trump administration has launched a major military buildup in the Carribean as it escalates pressure on President Nicolas Maduro.

news.title: 'Spoof' ship: Seized oil tanker Skipper hid location data, visited Iran and Venezuela
news.description: The seizure of the oil tanker Skipper comes as President Donald Trump has escalated pressure on Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro in recent weeks.

news.title: Broadcom’s results are due after Thursday’s close — here's what top analysts are expecting
news.description: Analysts anticipate strong forecasts for sales of its custom ASICs chips, and more clarity on Broadcom's fourth "mystery" customer.

news.title: Oracle shares tank 15%, dragging down Nvidia, AMD, CoreWeave
news.description: Investors have questioned Oracle's AI infrastructure plans and colossal amount of debt.

news.title: Rivian stock slides 6% after unveiling new AI tech and robotaxi ambitions
news.description: The company has also developed AI models to power its Autonomy+ subscription, which it intends to roll out early next year for $2,500 up front or $49.99 a month.

news.title: Trump pushes for top prosecutor nominee Halligan after judge tosses Comey, James cases
news.description: The Senate's "blue slip" tradition is likely to prevent Lindsey Halligan from becoming U.S. attorney for the Eastern District of Virginia.

news.title: Seized tanker will go to U.S. port, Trump administration intends 'to seize the oil'
news.description: The U.S. government has kept the proceeds from past seizures of foreign oil, generating $47 million from forfeited Iranian assets in 2024

news.title: Broadcom reports fourth quarter earnings after the bell
news.description: Broadcom stock is at all-time highs and has climbed 75% so far in 2025.

news.title: Trump administration's new quarters feature pilgrims, ditching civil rights theme
news.description: Special quarter-dollar coin designs for the U.S.' 250th birthday feature pilgrims and former presidents rather than previously floated civil rights themes.

news.title: U.S. has to stop taking in 'below-average' immigrants who won't help economy, says Lutnick
news.description: The White House is rolling out its gold card visa.

news.title: Bessent to propose major overhaul of regulatory body created from financial crisis
news.description: In a letter set to be released Thursday, Bessent will recommend changing the approach of the Financial Stability Oversight Council.

news.title: Bessent says U.S. will finish the year with 3% GDP growth, sees 'very strong' holiday season
news.description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said the economy will end the year on strong footing and said the president was disappointed in economic coverage in the media.

news.title: Core inflation rate watched by Fed hit 2.8%, delayed September data shows, lower than expected
news.description: The delayed core personal consumption expenditures price index for September was expected to show a 2.9% annual increase.

news.title: Trump 'sells out' U.S. national security with Nvidia chip sales to China, Sen. Warren says
news.description: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang "understands that ... being able to cozy up to Donald Trump might be the most important corporate CEO skill of all," Sen. Warren said.

news.title: Don't use Oracle and its challenges as a barometer for the many great AI stocks we own
news.description: The broader AI trade is back in the hot seat because of Oracle. It shouldn't be.

news.title: Sam Altman expects OpenAI to exit 'code red' by January after launch of GPT-5.2 model
news.description: The new model will be available starting Thursday within OpenAI's ChatGPT chatbot and its API.

news.title: GOP lawmakers seek Trump aid for agricultural equipment after tariff pressure
news.description: Top lawmakers signaled that more federal help to farmers could be on the way, which could help tractor sales.
